comment.author: 8793648@N06
comment._content: Wow, how high's that bridge? I don't think I'd like to cross it in a strong wind!

comment.author: 13812894@N00
comment._content: Thats great. With the train on there, it shows the scale of the bridge. This bridge is still the longest and highest of its kind in the world reaching 5,327.625 feet long (1.6km) and 314 feet high (96 meters). I shot a photo of it from underneath a couple of years ago.
